summary: This mod aims to add chests in various parts of skyrim all connected to each other, capable of storing in a cloud based chest. All chests that are part of this mod (or mods) are connected and inventory of the cloud chest can be activated through all of the access points (In-world chests).
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]
This mod aims to add chests in various parts of skyrim all connected to each other, capable of storing in a cloud based chest. All chests that are part of this mod (or mods) are connected and inventory of the cloud chest can be activated through all of the access points (In-world chests).

I am also planning on releasing sometime in the near future variants of this mod for Player Home chests, Apothecary satchels, and Enchanting satchels.
[heading]Known Bugs[/heading]
If you encounter any bugs, please feel free to comment them or message me concerning them, I will do my best to resolve them.
[list]
[*]
[/list]

[heading]Optional Files[/heading]
I will be including optional files to go along with this, and if the following are not already uploaded, I am planning on doing so in the near future.
[list]
[*] Dawnguard Plugin
[*] Dragonborn Plugin
[/list]
[b][u]Skyrim Chest Locations:[/b][/u][i](As of Version 1.0)[/i]
[list]
[*] Solitude Blacksmith
[*] Riften Blacksmith
[*] Windhelm Blacksmith
[*] Whiterun Blacksmith
[*] Whiterun Skyforge
[*] Markarth Blacksmith
[*] Dawnstar Blacksmith
[*] Falkreath Blacksmith
[*] Dark Brotherhood Falkreath Sanctuary
[*] Thieves Guild (Ragged Flagon - Cistern)
[/list]
[b][u]Dawnguard Chest Locations:[/b][/u]
[list]
[*] Fort Dawnguard
[*] Castle Volkihar
[/list]
[b][u]Dragonborn Chest Locations:[/b][/u]
[list]
[*] Raven Rock Blacksmith
[*] Skaal Village Blacksmith
[*] Severin Manor (Raven Rock Player Home)
[/list]

[heading]Change Log[/heading]

[heading]Version 1.0[/heading]
This is the original and main file for this mod. I will include all locations where a chest has been added.
[list]
[*] Solitude Blacksmith
[*] Riften Blacksmith
[*] Windhelm Blacksmith
[*] Whiterun Blacksmith
[*] Whiterun Skyforge
[*] Markarth Blacksmith
[*] Dawnstar Blacksmith
[*] Falkreath Blacksmith
[*] Dark Brotherhood Falkreath Sanctuary
[*] Thieves Guild (Ragged Flagon - Cistern)
[/list]

[heading]Credits[/heading]
Thank you [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4672007/?]DarkFox127[/url] for creation of his [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KsB4e8isB28]tutorial[/url] on how to do this following my messaging him asking how it could be done.
author: dmcthunder999
